Actions.ActionName: FOR EA:  Variable in KM Variables Collection
IF:  Exclude Local and Instance Variables

ThenActions.ActionName: FILTER: Process Tokens to Get Variable Contents
FILTER:  Get Size (# of chars) of Variable

Actions.ActionName: SCRIPT: Sort Variable List by Variable Size, Descending
Actions.Text:
# SORT on 1st Field, Descending, As Number
sort  -r -n

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
KM Variable List 
Total Number: 	%Variable%Local__NumVars%
Total Size:		%Variable%Local__TotalVarSize%
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

---------------------------------------------
# Chars	Variable
---------------------------------------------
%Variable%Local__VarList%
